episodes.title: One Of The Most DISTURBING CULT Leaders Ever | Warren Jeffs
Ep. 11 | Jim Jones | How the World's DEADLIEST Cult Leader Was Made
episodes.description: Jim Jones led his followers from hope to horror as the charismatic leader of the People’s Temple. What began as a vision of a utopian community ended in tragedy with the infamous Jonestown massacre. This episode I explore the twisted path that led to one of the largest mass suicides in history and the chilling legacy of Jim Jones.
